column4: the line where it says  package architecture (i386) does not match system (amd64) is probably the issue, is there a correct package for your system?
nope. I used --force-architecture when using dpkg -i because only a 32bit/i386 package was available.
and it can't be "CONFIGURED". All of the files are there. I'm even scanning from that printer right now, but I can
